content.query:
-- AGGREGATES BY AWARD
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewSummaryByAward
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(award_unique_key),
    FOR_APPEND
) AS SELECT  
t.award_unique_key, 
MAX(t.total_obligated_amount) AS total_obligated_amount,
MAX(a.total_face_value_of_loan) AS total_face_value_of_loan,
MIN(t.action_date_key) AS initial_action_date_key
FROM Prod.FactTransaction t
JOIN Prod.FactAssistance a ON t.transaction_unique_key = a.transaction_unique_key
GROUP BY t.award_unique_key;
GO;

-- AGGREGATES BY DAY
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewSummaryTotalsByDay
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(action_date_key)
) AS SELECT 
action_date_key,
COUNT(transaction_unique_key) AS number_of_transactions
FROM Prod.FactTransaction
GROUP BY action_date_key;
GO;

-- FUNDING AGENCIES BY DAY
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewAgenciesByDay
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(action_date_key)
) AS SELECT 
t.action_date_key,
a.agency_name,
COUNT(a.agency_code) AS agency_count
FROM Prod.FactTransaction t 
JOIN Prod.DimAgency a ON a.agency_code = t.funding_agency_code
GROUP BY t.action_date_key, a.agency_name;
GO;

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewAgenciesByMonth
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(calendar_month)
) AS SELECT 
d.calendar_month,
a.agency_name,
COUNT(a.agency_code) AS agency_count
FROM Prod.FactTransaction t
JOIN Prod.DimDate d ON d.date_key = t.action_date_key
JOIN Prod.DimAgency a ON a.agency_code = t.funding_agency_code
GROUP BY d.calendar_month, a.agency_name;
GO;

-- -- RECIPIENTS BY MONTH
-- SELECT 
-- t.action_date_key,
-- r.recipient_name_raw,
-- COUNT(r.recipient_uei) AS recipient_count
-- FROM Prod.FactTransaction t 
-- JOIN Prod.DimRecipient r ON r.recipient_uei = t.recipient_uei
-- GROUP BY t.action_date_key, r.recipient_name_raw;

-- INDUSTRIES BY DAY
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewIndustriesByDay
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(action_date_key)
) AS SELECT 
t.action_date_key,
n.naics_code,
n.naics_description,
COUNT(n.naics_key) AS industry_count
FROM Prod.FactTransaction t 
JOIN Prod.FactContract c ON t.transaction_unique_key = c.transaction_unique_key
JOIN Prod.DimNAICS n ON n.naics_key = c.naics_key
GROUP BY t.action_date_key, n.naics_code, n.naics_description;
GO;

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewIndustriesByMonth
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(calendar_month)
) AS SELECT 
d.calendar_month,
n.naics_code,
n.naics_description,
COUNT(n.naics_key) AS industry_count
FROM Prod.FactTransaction t
JOIN Prod.DimDate d ON t.action_date_key = d.date_key
JOIN Prod.FactContract c ON t.transaction_unique_key = c.transaction_unique_key
JOIN Prod.DimNAICS n ON n.naics_key = c.naics_key
GROUP BY d.calendar_month, n.naics_code, n.naics_description;
GO;

-- SMALL BUSINESS NUMBERS BY DAY
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewSmallBusinessSummaryByDay
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(action_date_key)
) AS SELECT
t.action_date_key,
COUNT_BIG(CASE WHEN c.business_size_key = 1 THEN 1 END) AS small_business_transactions,
COUNT_BIG(c.business_size_key) AS total_transactions
FROM Prod.FactTransaction t
JOIN Prod.FactContract c ON t.transaction_unique_key = c.transaction_unique_key
GROUP BY t.action_date_key;
GO;

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewSmallBusinessSummaryByMonth
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(calendar_month)
) AS SELECT
d.calendar_month,
COUNT_BIG(CASE WHEN c.business_size_key = 1 THEN 1 END) AS small_business_transactions,
COUNT_BIG(c.business_size_key) AS total_transactions
FROM Prod.FactTransaction t
JOIN Prod.DimDate d ON t.action_date_key = d.date_key
JOIN Prod.FactContract c ON t.transaction_unique_key = c.transaction_unique_key
GROUP BY d.calendar_month;
GO;

-- SUM of federal obligated amount based on county fips code with state
SELECT * FROM Prod.DimDate;
SELECT * FROM Prod.FactTransaction WHERE prime_award_transaction_recipient_county_fips_code LIKE '22%';
SELECT * FROM Prod.DimCounty;

SELECT * FROM Prod.ViewAgenciesByMonth;

DROP VIEW Prod.ViewObligatedFedAmtByFips;

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW Prod.ViewObligatedFedAmtByFips
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(prime_award_transaction_recipient_county_fips_code)
) AS SELECT
t.prime_award_transaction_recipient_county_fips_code,
COUNT_BIG(t.total_obligated_amount) AS [total obligated amount],
c.ctyname AS [county name],
c.stname AS [state name],
c.gdp_2022,
c.perc_less_than_hs_17_21,
c.perc_hs_only_17_21,
c.perc_some_college_17_21,
c.perc_bach_or_higher_17_21,
c.popestimate2019,
c.popestimate2020,
c.popestimate2021,
c.popestimate2022
FROM Prod.FactTransaction t
JOIN Prod.DimCounty c ON t.prime_award_transaction_recipient_county_fips_code = c.county_fips
GROUP BY t.prime_award_transaction_recipient_county_fips_code,
c.ctyname,c.stname,
c.gdp_2022,
c.perc_less_than_hs_17_21,
c.perc_hs_only_17_21,
c.perc_some_college_17_21,
c.perc_bach_or_higher_17_21,
c.popestimate2019,
c.popestimate2020,
c.popestimate2021,
c.popestimate2022
GO;
